languages.text: Аномалии Увечного сектора похитили из тела Абеляра здоровье и силу, состарив на десятилетия. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Аномалии Увечного сектора похитили из тела Абеляра здоровье и силу, состарив на десятилетия. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.
The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

languages.text: 切り裂かれた星域の異常がアベラルドの健康と活力を奪い、彼は数十年分老いてしまった。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 切り裂かれた星域の異常がアベラルドの健康と活力を奪い、彼は数十年分老いてしまった。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 崩落区的怪物窃取了阿贝拉德的生命力，让他转瞬之间年迈了几十岁。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 崩落区的怪物窃取了阿贝拉德的生命力，让他转瞬之间年迈了几十岁。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除

languages.text: Las anomalías del Sector Destrozado le han robado a Abelard la salud y el vigor, haciendo que envejezca varias décadas. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Las anomalías del Sector Destrozado le han robado a Abelard la salud y el vigor, haciendo que envejezca varias décadas. No se puede curar por medios normales

languages.text: Die Anomalien im Zerfleischten Sektor haben Abelard Gesundheit und Lebenskraft geraubt und ihn um Jahrzehnte altern lassen. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Die Anomalien im Zerfleischten Sektor haben Abelards Gesundheit und Lebenskraft geraubt und ihn um Jahrzehnte altern lassen.

languages.text: Les anomalies du Secteur condamné ont sapé la vitalité et la vigueur d'Abélard, qui donne l'impression d'avoir pris vingt ans. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Les anomalies du Secteur condamné ont sapé la vitalité et la vigueur d'Abélard, qui donne l'impression d'avoir pris vingt ans. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.

languages.text: Biçimsiz Sektör anomalileri, Abelard'ın sağlığını ve gücünü çalarak onu onlarca yıl yaşlandırdı.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour, aging him several decades. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Ezilmiş Sektör'ün anomalileri, Abelard'ın sağlığını ve gücünü çalarak onu birkaç nesil yaşlandırıyor.

languages.text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades. Can't be removed by normal means.

traits.locale_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades. Can't be removed by normal means.
